{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Slaughtaur missile | class = CentaurFX | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: CentaurFX
The projectile fired by a [[Classes:CentaurLeader|Slaughtaur]]'s [[Classes:CentaurShield|shield]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR CentaurFX { {{Property|Speed}} 20 {{Property|Damage}} 4 {{Property|Projectile}} +{{Flag|SPAWNSOUNDSOURCE}} {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add {{Property|SeeSound}} "CentaurLeaderAttack" {{Property|DeathSound}} "CentaurMissileExplode" States { Spawn: CTFX A -1 Bright Stop Death: CTFX B 4 Bright CTFX C 3 Bright CTFX D 4 Bright CTFX E 3 Bright CTFX F 2 Bright Stop } }
